title: List of PGA Championship champions
summary: The PGA Championship is an annual golf competition formerly held in mid-August until 2019, when it moved to mid-May. It was established in 1916 and is one of the four major championships played each year which include the Masters, the U.S. Open, and the Open Championship (British Open).[1] In addition, this championship is conducted by the Professional Golfers Association (PGA).  Due to World War I and II, the competition was not held from 1917 to 1918 and in 1943, respectively.
